content.title: Disability Assistance For Registered Worker (HBOCWWB)
content.department: Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana
content.details: The scheme 'Disability Assistance for Registered Worker (HBOCWWB)' was launched by the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana. Under the scheme, a lump sum financial assistance of ₹1.50 lakh to ₹3.00 lakh is given to registered workers on the basis of the percentage of disability which occurred due to an accident at the workplace during the course of employment.
eligibility: The worker should be registered under Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB).
The registered worker should have regular membership.
The registered worker who has become disabled due to an accident at the workplace during the course of employment is eligible to apply under the scheme.
It is mandatory to apply within one year of becoming disabled.
The disability Certificates in regard to the percentage of disability issued by the Government Medical Board.
documents_required: Identity proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card
Disability Certificate issued by the Medical Board

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, a lump sum financial assistance of ₹1.50 lakh to ₹3.00 lakh is given to registered workers on the basis of the percentage of disability which occurred due to an accident at the workplace during the course of employment.

faqs.question: Which department has launched this scheme?
faqs.answer: Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to get the benefits under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The registered worker who has become disabled due to an accident at the workplace during the course of employment is eligible to apply under the scheme.

faqs.question: Can a general category worker be eligible to apply under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is for all categories of workers.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for a resident of Haryana State?
faqs.answer: Yes, the applicant should be a permanent resident/domicile of Haryana State.

faqs.question: Is it mandatory for workers to have a regular membership under the board?
faqs.answer: Yes, the registered worker should have regular membership.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Financial assistance of ₹1.50 lakh to ₹3.00 lakh is given to registered workers on the basis of the percentage of disability which occurred due to an accident at the workplace during the course of employment.

faqs.question: Who will issue the Disability Certificate to registered worker?
faqs.answer: The Disability Certificate in regard to the percentage of disability issued by the Government Medical Board.

faqs.question: In how many days the application form can be submitted to the Competent Authority?
faqs.answer: It is mandatory to apply within one year of becoming disabled.

faqs.question: How can a construction worker get registered under HBOCWWB?
faqs.answer: For registration, the construction worker should visit the Official Website of the Labour Department Haryana.

faqs.question: Is there any registration fee needed while registering under HBOCWWB?
faqs.answer: Yes, the first-time registration charges are ₹25/- and the registration fees vary according to the renewal time period.

faqs.question: How can an applicant apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The eligible applicant may apply online mode.

faqs.question: How can an applicant apply online under the scheme?
faqs.answer: For online application, the applicant should visit the Official Portal - Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
